column1: '''The Mad Badger Inn''' is an inn found in the middle of [[Archet]]. [[Captain Brackenbrook]] commanded Archet's garrison from the inn.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
column2: Introduction]], ''Intro: Captain Brackenbrook''</ref> It was destroyed when the [[Blackwolds]] attacked Archet.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings Online]], [[Bree-land Introduction
